content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Bo Li. Based on the information you have provided, I believe that a rental price of 800 Euros per month would be fair. This takes into consideration the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Munich. Of course, I am open to discussing any potential adjustments to this price. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month, thank you for your understanding.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 800 Euros per month. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the apartment or the rental agreement. I'm happy to work with you to ensure that this is a smooth and successful rental experience for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your help, I really appreciate it. Can you give me the contact information for the apartment so that I can give it to my colleagues in China who will be helping with the rental process?

And also, can you give me the contact information for your company so that I can give it to my colleagues in China who will be helping with the rental process?

I'll give you the contact information for my colleagues in China, they can reach out to you if they have any questions or concerns.

Thank you again.

Best regards,

Bo Li
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Of course, Bo Li. I'm glad to be of assistance. Here is the contact information for the apartment:

Address: [insert address here]
Phone: [insert phone number here]
Email: [insert email address here]

And here is the contact information for my company:

Address: [insert address here]
Phone: [insert phone number here]
Email: [insert email address here]

Please feel free to share this information with your colleagues in China. If they have any questions or concerns, they can reach out to me directly.

Thank you again for choosing my apartment for your rental needs. I look forward to working with you.
name: Heinrich Heine
